name: AudioNode.connect
description: If the destination is a node, connect() returns a reference to the destination AudioNode object, allowing you to chain multiple connect() calls. In some browsers, older implementations of this interface return undefined.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'connect() to an AudioNode' in the 'Web Audio API' specification.
